channel.title: Thoughts on Jim Mitchell
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Jim Mitchell

item.title: Seeing the Forest for the Trees
item.description: No matter how well-intentioned we are, sometimes we allow things to sneak into our lives under the guise of it being something important.

item.title: Start Somewhere
item.description: Eventually you use up every excuse in your book for not doing the thing you keep saying you’re going to do.

item.title: Eliminating Digital Distractions
item.description: Life is so full of distractions. It seems everything is vying for our attention in one way or another these days, with most of it coming from our electronic gadgets.

item.title: The Spin Cycle
item.description: We move from one thing to the next and then another in search of a quick thrill, because we’ve become instant gratification junkies.

item.title: Saying No
item.description: Saying no can be one of the hardest things we can do for ourselves.
